end user use of Windows Corporate Security Policies and Compliance Certifications and on the job experience has given me the skills needed to understand both internal security polices and external compliance regulations such and PCI SOX etc 7 years Technical Writing Strong technical writing skills from years of having to create policy and procedure docs 8 years
